website_summaries.verdict: Best choice for those whose bug bites tend to get infected.
pros: Doesn't just relieve itch – also protects against infection
Multiple other uses, including soothing rashes, sunburns, and extremely dry skin
Also works on some pet wounds
cons: Some say that the product isn't as effective as the body gets used to its effects

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Stop Insectitching from Insect Bites
customer_reviews.text: We live in Texas; so, of course, I wanted this product for insect bites. The brand name has been trusted for burns and scrapes for many years; so, I thought I would keep tubes in several locations for quick relief. Soon, the first mosquito bite I got; I grabbed the tube. Well, I was still itching an hour later. No relief! I went back to the best method I know - very cold water with some bleach and a cotton pad to apply. Ahhh! Quick results! I don't like the danger of causing bleach spots somewhere; but, the itching needed to be stopped ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: Great for itch, pain relief and healing.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best for bites scrapes and skin irritation. My M.D. recommended it years ago as an "old school" remedy that is hard to find bit worth it. None of the issues with steroids or antibiotics and great itch and bir relief. Please keep making this great product! Put a tube in a handy spot.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best itching medicine I have ever used. Helped me get rid of severe eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Tdrman

customer_reviews.title: Great for insect bites
customer_reviews.text: The Lanacane is difficult to find in the stores and I appreciate finding it on line. This product works well on insect bites, small cuts, etc. It doesn't have an odor and it does't sting.
customer_reviews.author: S Standing Bear

customer_reviews.title: ... itching but only for a short while I have terrible
customer_reviews.text: It does take away the itching but only for a short while I have terrible shingles
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: True pain reliever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is good for more than itching. I have herpetic nerve damage leading to intense pain on a plain, healthy patch of skin. I wear pain patches, but they are 12 hours on and 12 hours off. When they are off, I have found that rubbing this ointment in deadens the painful nerve endings and lets me live a pain=free life. It is 30% benzocaine, which is a powerful anesthetic, and won't stain even a white dress shirt. I can't make it without my Lanacane!
customer_reviews.author: Fran Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: as for the produ t its the best chigger treatment ive found
customer_reviews.text: exellent ser ive. I received it a day earlier than expected. as for the produ t its the best chigger treatment ive found. one application and the itch is gane. if you are from tbe south you know how awfull a chigger bite is.I ve used every thing from nailpolish to bleach lanacane is the only thing thT works.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Benzocaine 20% is the only thing that works.
customer_reviews.text: For itchiness and redness. Immediate results. Just recieved, applied and already after one hour itching is gone, redness and bumps are receding. ChiggerexX2 is discontinued, so I gave this a try. Not as smooth to put on, a bit chaulky,but it works. Apply less than more, avoid touching lips or eyes after applying. Wash hands thoroughly after using. Don't touch other people and kids before washing either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Itch Relief
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking for the spray Lanacane but I couldn't find it anywhere so I decided to give the cream a chance. It works pretty well but is a little thick after application. The spray is just so much more convenient but apparently they have quit making it. I will continue to use this form because it does work to control the itching from bug bites.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the size and it does work but not wonderfully. I expected more from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Dutch Fab

customer_reviews.title: Best for bug bites
customer_reviews.text: This stuff, in my opinion, is the best stuff for bug bites. It takes the itch away instantly and lasts. This is the only thing I buy for bug bites for 10+ years now.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper55

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works.
customer_reviews.text: This is my standby. I don’t have any itch that this stuff won’t help. It is not recommended for large areas of the body, but I never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Pat

customer_reviews.title: Stops the itch
customer_reviews.text: Use this on misquote bites all the time. Now matter what I do they always get me at least once. This stops the itch instantly.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I ended up with a skin rash, a side effect of a medication I was taking. After the first application of Lanacane extra strength I felt immediate relief from irritation and pain. After applying once in the morning and once in the evening for four days, the rash is gone...thankfully. I would hug recommend Lanacane (maximum strength cream).
customer_reviews.author: Kare

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!! Desperately needed!
customer_reviews.text: Am often in need of this (herpes zoster), and it is yet another commodity no longer available here. Really appreciate the rapid delivery and the multiples in one pack. Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: CalNative

customer_reviews.title: Effective pain and itch relief
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Calms pain sensors Stops skin irritations like itch. Antiseptic properties we highly recommend this product, especially the cream over the gel.

customer_reviews.title: Anti-Itch Standard

customer_reviews.title: Stop itch and receive immediate relief

customer_reviews.title: Great for bug bites!!!

product_meta.title: Lanacane Maximum Strength Anti-itch Cream- Antiseptic For Fast-acting Itchy Skin Relief From Insect Bites, Rashes & Dry Skin, Cools & Soothes For Instant Relief, With Benzocaine, 1 oz. (Pack of 3)
feature_bullets: For bug bites and stings, poison ivy, oak and sumac, dry irritated skin, minor cuts/burns
Kills germs to help prevent infection
Hours and hours of maximum pain and itch relief
